H0.text: In 1995, Steffi Graf became the only tennis player to have won each of the four grand slam events how many times. 3

H2.text: In 1995, Steffi Graf became the only tennis player to have won each of the four grand slam events how many times. 6

H3.text: In 1995, Steffi Graf became the only tennis player to have won each of the four grand slam events how many times. 4

A4.text: Graf won seven singles titles at Wimbledon, six singles titles at the French Open, five singles titles at the US Open, and four singles titles at the Australian Open.

A5.text: only female players are Evonne Goolagong Cawley, Margaret Court, Billie Jean King, Chris Evert, Martina Navratilova, Steffi Graf, Serena Williams, Iga Swiatek, Maria Sharapova, Garbi√±e Muguruza, Simona Halep and Ashleigh Barty.

A6.text: Chris Evert is the only woman to have won US Open singles titles on two surfaces (clay and hardcourt).

A7.text: In 1973, the US Open became the first Grand Slam tournament to award equal prize money to men and women, with that year's singles champions, John Newcombe and Margaret Court, receiving $25,000 each.
